1553169115_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJV.body: We (Netherlands) can just register the car online at dozens of different insurance companies. The car's insured instantly and after a couple of days you receive the insurance papers at home.

> [leftside](#comment_656_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): Do u have to visit every each company's site to quote the price and the conditions?How long does it take, and how many companies do u browse to compare the quotations and the conditions??Is it possible to do the job via phone call?
No, there are websites that compare the prices of all insurance companies, including best terms and conditions. Yep, you can call all the companies as well to get insured. In both cases, it won't take more than a couple of minutes.
